# title

**Instance Property**

The title for the monogram.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var title: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The title appears below the person’s name and usually describes the person’s role in the media item.

## Configuring a Monogram

- **personNameComponents**: The names used to create a monogram image.
- **image**: The custom image for the monogram.
- **subtitle**: The subtitle for the monogram.
